content.query:
--Copia de datos con la creacion de la tabla de forma autom√°tica
COPY INTO dwh.quantity_of_vehicle_by_type_copy
FROM 'https://entixcoviddl.dfs.core.windows.net/electric-vehicle-data/gold/quantity_of_vehicle_by_type'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET',
	MAXERRORS = 0,
	AUTO_CREATE_TABLE = 'ON'
)
GO

/*
--Creacion de la tabla de destino de forma manual
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'quantity_of_vehicle_by_type_copy' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dwh')
CREATE TABLE dwh.quantity_of_vehicle_by_type_copy
	(
	 [year] smallint,
	 [month] tinyint,
	 [make] nvarchar(50),
	 [electric_vehicle_type] nvarchar(50),
	 [vehicle_register_count] int
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO
*/



SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dwh.quantity_of_vehicle_by_type_copy
GO
